name: tm64
effect: Teaches Explosion to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Explosion to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black-white: The user explodes to inflict damage on those around it. The user faints upon using this move.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user explodes to inflict damage on those around it. The user faints upon using this move.
